design_philosophy.name: Swiss Organic
core_principles: Clarity through Contrast: Black ink on warm paper.
Asymmetry: Align left, leave right open for breath.
Objectivity: The job data is the hero. No decorations.
Touch: Buttons and cards should feel 'physical' (borders + shadows).

typography.instructions: Import 'Space Grotesk' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts. Use Space Grotesk for all Headings and prominent numbers/stats.

usage_rules: Background must be the warm off-white (#FDFCF8), NOT pure white.
Card backgrounds are Pure White (#FFFFFF) to pop against the warm background.
Accent (Tags/Highlights): International Klein Blue (#002FA7) - Use sparingly for 'New' badges or active states.

layout.grid_system: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 md:gap-8
strategies: Mobile First: 1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3 on desktop.
The 'Tetris' logic: The first card (Featured Job) can span 2 columns if using a bento layout, but for simplicity, keep uniform 3-col grid.
Search Hero: The search bar is not just a tool, it's the Hero section. Make it huge.

job_card.style: bg-card border border-border/60 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl
structure: Top: Company Logo (48px square, rounded-lg) + Date Posted (Right)
Bottom: Tags (Remote, Type, Salary) + Apply Button (Hidden until hover? No, visible but subtle).

search_hero.input_style: text-4xl md:text-6xl font-heading bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-primary outline-none placeholder:text-muted-foreground/40 w-full py-4 transition-colors

modal.style: bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-xl border border-border shadow-2xl p-0 overflow-hidden sm:rounded-2xl max-w-3xl w-full

filters.item: rounded-full px-6 py-2 border border-border hover:border-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground transition-all cursor-pointer text-sm font-medium

interactions: Entrance: Staggered fade-in for list items (0.1s delay per item).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup: Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion'. Add Google Fonts to index.css.
2. Data: Create a 'mockJobs' array with at least 8 items. Use the provided logo URLs randomly.
3. Structure: Single page 'JobBoard'. State for search, filter, and 'selectedJob' (for modal).
4. Styling: Overwrite tailwind.config.js colors with the 'Swiss Organic' palette provided.
5. Precision: Ensure the grid aligns perfectly. Use 'container mx-auto'.
6. Detail: Add a 'No results found' state that looks designed, not just text.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it matte.
Do NOT center the text in the cards. Left align always.
Use proper semantic HTML (article for cards, main for content).
Ensure 'data-testid' is on all interactive elements.
